00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.BlogML
00029 {
00033     public class Categories
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040         public Categories(XmlElement Element)
00041         {
00042             foreach (XmlNode Children in Element.ChildNodes)
00043             {
00044                 if (Children.Name.Equals("category", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00045                 {
00046                     _Categories.Add(new Category((XmlElement)Children));
00047                 }
00048             }
00049         }
00050         #endregion
00051 
00052         #region Private Variables
00053         private List<Category> _Categories = new List<Category>();
00054         #endregion
00055 
00056         #region Public Properties
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060         public List<Category> CategoryList
00061         {
00062             get { return _Categories; }
00063             set { _Categories = value; }
00064         }
00065 
00071         public Category this[string index]
00072         {
00073             get
00074             {
00075                 foreach (Category Category in CategoryList)
00076                 {
00077                     if (Category.ID.Equals(index))
00078                     {
00079                         return Category;
00080                     }
00081                 }
00082                 return null;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         #endregion
00086     }
00087 }
